name: Mermaid Princess Survival
description:
Swim with three beautiful Mermaid princess and help them survive from the dangers of sea. The Mermaids are collecting fish coins and trying to survive from the miens and dangerous scary sharks. Mermaid was looking for the prince and she lost her way home.The poor little mermaid lost her way home and the sea is dangerous . This is one of a kind Mermaid Princess Fun and loving game. After playing with these three little mermaids you will get the feeling that mermaids are real and you have got to help them.

Game Features
- Fish Coin collection
- Unlock the Princess
- Complete different missions
- Collect 5 different powers
